column8: HEALTH IMPACTS OF CAFFEINE CONSUMPTION AND EXPLORING ALTERNATIVE  COPING  STRATEGIES AMONG STUDENTS DURING EXAMINATIONS AT OBAFEMI AWOLOWO UNIVERSITY, ILE-IFE, NIGERIA
column9: This questionnaire is used to collect data about the level of caffeine consumption among students of Obafemi Awolowo University during the examination period and to find out the effects the consumption has been having. The questionnaire will also assess the coping mechanisms of non-consumers of caffeine during the same period. Please your sincere responses are needed for the success of this study. All information provided will be for academic purposes only and remain confidential. You consent to the study by completing the questionnaire. Thank you for your support.
column10: Do you agree to participate in this study?
